Articles.Content: Hello, I\'m KleptoKat. I\'m an average KSPer, just learned how to achieve a successful orbit. Anyway, I played back in .8ish, which was pretty fun. However I was caught up with stuff. Anyway, I am a Minecraft server administrator, I have a large amount of compassion for your mother, Lisa, and I am also interested in ponies. (Brohoof)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

OFF-TOPIC: server IP?

ON-TOPIC: Welcome! if you need any help PM me.

Welcome to the Forums! I\'m sure you\'ll find us to be quite the lively bunch.

Have Fun!

- Your Friendly Neighborhood Moderator,

Radion Spaceworks

Welcome to the forums and enjoy your stay.

Nova\'s not around, so...

\*brohoof\*

-Mincespy
